properties.address: Barrow Library, Barrow-in-Furness, Cumbria LA14 1LL
properties.description: Public Library The library provides: Browsing and borrowing Two hours computer access with available printing and books. Hot and cold drinks vending machine In person activities: KNIT AND NATTER Tuesdays 14:00- 15:30 FRIENDSHIP GROUP Thursdays 14:00-16:00 Relaxed drop in group, supported by the library and Westmorland and Furness Health and Wellbeing Team Sip 'n' Surf Thursdays 13:30- 15:00 Come along and learn how to get the most out of your phone, laptop and tablet. English Cafe Fridays 10:00- 12:00 Open to non native English speakers, come and play games, drink coffee and practice your English with us.
properties.title: Barrow in Furness Library
